feedback:
Good attempt at Pataka! You're on the right track. Here's what to focus on:

**What to adjust:**
• Let's bring those fingers together, nice and close, touching each other.
• Gently press your thumb more closely to the side of your palm.

**You're doing well:**
• Your fingers are extended! That's a great start!

Keep practicing - you're making progress! Remember, mudras take time and patience to master. You've got this!
